title: Half Way To Love
description: Sometimes the end is really just the beginning…Shannon didn’t want to accept the assignment. Singing telegrams delivered on Valentine’s should celebrate love, not be used to end a relationship. Unfortunately, Shannon has bills to pay. So she dons her sexy cupid outfit and sets out to do her job—breaking the heart of the sexiest man she’s ever laid eyes on.But Stockbroker Alexander Stone is far from heartbroken when a mocha beauty pops into his lap and lets him know the three-year relationship with his shallow, spoiled girlfriend is over. How could he be when fate has delivered such an enticing second chance? Now, if only he can convince Shannon…
author: Tressie Lockwood
